item.title: Commands wont work
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Kyle11594, post:6, topic:170905”]Um… 1 minute. Ill give you the real update to yours…

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { String[] token = command.split(" "); int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }

I made that one personally. Remember to delete the whole last code you had before. After you replace it with this one. Make sure your server is off before you save it on notepad. And also before you start your server again. compile it after saving the notepad and before restarting the server. If it doesnt work. Message me. BTW that one works for silab and non silab servers I think.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2008, 05:10:25 PM[/size][hr]Btw it was a joke. Wow…[/quote]
You, did, not, make, that, personally. ++ for lying.

And also before you start your server again. compile it after saving the notepad and before restarting the server. If it doesnt work. Message me. item.title: Commands wont work
item.dc:creator: @Zaikill Zaikill
item.description:
@Zaikill wrote:

i was install the backup client.java and now i cant use he commands ???
my characters are admin
in client.java i have Rights = 2

and my pickup are :

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(".") || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“de”)))) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}

why it dont work for any admin commands ??? -_-
